original_title: A Day With Chloe Temple & Sky Pierce
overview: Wake up next to your girlfriend Chloe, who always has something kinky on her mind. Spend the whole day with her, playing sexy games and more! Take a shower together - she needs your sensitive touch and hard sex. After a healthy breakfast, jump in the pool with her and have some fun... The best thing about Chloe is that she's always horny and very open-minded. When Sky arrives, girls try on bikinis and when they discover your boner, things get out of hand... What are you waiting for? Let's get on with it now!
title: A Day With Chloe Temple & Sky Pierce
